page.title: 04CLUBS Sports
page.content: There are a variety of clubs in and around the town which cater for most sports; football,cricket,netball,judo, basketball,baseball,trampolining, swimming,badminton,squash,table tennis and many others our class are not in. Here are two we have members of. {Gymnastics { }Hurstpierpoint Gym Club meet on different nights. There are about three hundred of us altogether from different schools. We learn agilities and acrobatic balances for our BAGA Awards, enter competitions and put on displays. { {Karate There is a Karate club at Southway School, in the evening. It teaches you moves and special kicks. You have to pass tests, and if you pass you go up a colour. I have a purple belt, and my father has the highest, a black belt.
